bill.title: Relating to elections.
bill.description: Requires Secretary of State to conduct study and analyze provisions of Oregon Constitution, Oregon Revised Statutes and Oregon Administrative Rules relating to voter access. Requires Secretary of State to conduct study and analyze provisions of Oregon Constitution, Oregon Revised Statutes and Oregon Administrative Rules relating to voter access. Requires secretary to develop recommendations regarding most effective methods for improving voter access and increasing voter participation. Requires secretary to submit report to interim legislative committees on rules by September 15, 2024. Sunsets January 2, 2025.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
